metadata.title: Docx Unpacker | Free Online Tool to View & Extract .docx Files
metadata.description: Instantly unpack, view, and download the contents of your .docx files. Explore the raw XML and media files within any Word document right in your browser. No software installation required.

page.title: Docx Unpacker
page.footer: Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Unpack .docx files with ease.

docxUnpacker.fileReadError: Failed to read or process the file.

fileUpload.title: Drop your .docx file here
fileUpload.subtitle: or click below to select a file from your computer

fileViewer.selectFileSubtitle: Click on a file in the structure to view its contents.
fileViewer.noPreviewSubtitle: Cannot display a preview for this file type.
